name: Pear Clicker: Remaster
description:
Pear Clicker remastered is the most exciting (and probably the only) pear clicking game of the HYSTORY (as I said, it's the only one. This makes it the best anyway).

Click the pear to earn more pears (pretend that makes sense somehow) and be the king of the Pear industries worldwidely!

Follow us on instagram: @moonshldevteam

Free KeyCode (brings you in advantage in-game): IYF672YHF9
